role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that sets up a firewall on many different platforms and comes with tight integration with the main ProfessorManhattan playbook
role_description_full_overview: This role is intended to be used with the ProfessorManhattan playbook. It integrates tightly with the other roles included with the playbook.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that sets up a firewall on many different platforms and comes with tight integration with the main ProfessorManhattan playbook.
